headline: Paychex and PayPal Team Up to Bring Direct Deposit Alternatives Into Paychex Flex® Perks
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., January 08, 2026--Paychex, Inc. (Nasdaq: PAYX), an industry-leading human capital management (HCM) company, announced today a new partnership with PayPal (Nasdaq: PYPL) within its Paychex Flex® Perks platform, Paychex’s digital marketplace of curated employee benefits. Through this collaboration, employees of Paychex customers have the ability to easily set up PayPal Direct Deposit, providing up to two-day early access to their paychecks.

headline: Jim Cramer on Paypal: “The Company’s Been Late to New Technologies”
summary: PayPal Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) is one of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 stocks Jim Cramer commented on. Cramer highlighted the stock’s valuation during the episode, as he commented: “Finally, the fifth-worst performer in the Nasdaq-100 was a real conundrum, PayPal. It was down more than 31% last year. headline: PayPal, Stripe and other fintech giants flex crypto muscles — ‘2026 is going to be massive’
summary: Fintechs will push further into crypto in 2026. Here's how Stripe, PayPal and others are positioning themselves.

headline: How PayPal’s New Transaction Graph Analytics Program Will Impact PayPal Holdings (PYPL) Investors
summary: In early January 2026, PayPal launched its Transaction Graph Insights & Measurement program, giving merchants and advertisers a cross-merchant view of real shopper behavior, campaign performance, and data-driven recommendations using transaction data from more than 430 million consumer accounts and tens of millions of merchants. This initiative highlights how PayPal can translate its broad payment footprint into a full-funnel commerce media and analytics offering, with early clients such as...
